section.p: and cross the off your Adventure Sheet.
'Excellent!' says Hemmuwa Tamalkaya. He begins work on the iron golem, placing the ore inside its head. He seems to have forgotten you are there.
'Um, you said you'd pay me for the ore,' you say politely.
'Eh, what?' mutters the wizard looking up. 'Oh, yes, the adventurer. Hmm. Actually, there may be one more service you can do for me,' he says.
